handlers.code:
if not databank then
    system.print("ERROR: No databank connected!")
    unit.exit()
    return
end

local keys = databank.getKeyList()
system.print("=== GETVALUE TEST ===")
system.print("Total keys: " .. #keys)
system.print("")

system.print("First 15 keys in databank:")
for i = 1, math.min(15, #keys) do
    system.print("  [" .. i .. "] " .. keys[i])
end
system.print("")

local testKeys = {"hematite", "bauxite", "coal", "quartz", "chromite", "natron", "limestone"}
system.print("Testing getValue() methods:")
for _, key in ipairs(testKeys) do
    local hasKey = databank.hasKey(key)
    system.print("\n[" .. key .. "]")
    system.print("  hasKey: " .. tostring(hasKey == 1))
    
    if hasKey == 1 then
        -- Try string value
        local stringVal = databank.getStringValue(key)
        system.print("  getStringValue: '" .. tostring(stringVal) .. "'")
        system.print("  String length: " .. string.len(stringVal))
        
        -- Try float value
        local floatVal = databank.getFloatValue(key)
        system.print("  getFloatValue: " .. tostring(floatVal))
        
        -- Try int value
        local intVal = databank.getIntValue(key)
        system.print("  getIntValue: " .. tostring(intVal))
    end
end

system.print("\n=== Testing .c keys ===")
local cTestKeys = {"hematite.c", "bauxite.c", "coal.c"}
for _, key in ipairs(cTestKeys) do
    local hasKey = databank.hasKey(key)
    system.print("\n[" .. key .. "]")
    system.print("  hasKey: " .. tostring(hasKey == 1))
    
    if hasKey == 1 then
        local stringVal = databank.getStringValue(key)
        system.print("  getStringValue: '" .. tostring(stringVal) .. "'")
        system.print("  String length: " .. string.len(stringVal))
    end
end

unit.exit()
